name: Sleet Slip
description:
This game was created in under ten hours for a class presentation for PA Distance Learning Charter School.

Use the mouse to avoid the icicles. (Press "T" for a hidden game mode!)

This game uses assets from other artists.

Sound Effects:

Freeze Sound – Created by user JustInvoke and can be found at https://freesound.org/people/JustInvoke/sounds/446112/

Ocean Waves Ambiance – Created by user Noted451 and can be found at https://freesound.org/people/Noted451/sounds/531015/

Time Milestone Sound – Created by user xtrgamr and can be found at https://freesound.org/people/xtrgamr/sounds/244534/

Music:

Gameplay – “The Lagoon,” by user davidkvis99, found at https://opengameart.org/content/the-lagoon

Menu – “Funk House,” by user Of Far Different Nature, found at https://opengameart.org/content/funky-house

Visual:

Background sourced from http://clipart-library.com/clipart/162420.htm
